      • fastInvSqrt

        public static float fastInvSqrt(float number)
        According to my benchmarks you will usually do this in the same amount of time than "regular" way of doing this.

        However at scenarios, where it will be called 1000x times a second it will be useful.

        Based completely off of: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fast_inverse_square_root

        Parameters:
        number - the number to find the inv. sqrt. for
        Returns:
        the inv. sqrt. !APPROXIMATION! of the number

      • clamp

        public static float clamp(float value,
                          float min,
                          float max)
        Clamps the value between the min and max values
        Parameters:
        value - to clamp
        min - the minimum value
        max - the maximum value
        Returns:
        value if it's between min and max otherwise min or max
